headline.main: NAZI PRESS ADMITS U.S. LOOMS AS FOE; People Are Told for First Time That Our Aid to Britain May Bring Us Into War HITLER'S WARNING CITED But Rome Spokesman Predicts We Will Disregard It -- Huge Attack Forecast

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Feb. 2 -- There is no dearth of German comment on United States affairs in the press or in other mediums of expression these days. The ban that kept virtually all such comment from the newspapers for the last twelve months or more has now apparently been lifted and the plain language of American statesmen and other personalities finds its answer in plain language employed on the German side.
abstract: Germany: ban on news of U S policy eased
